name: Gobi Manchurian (Dry)
description: Crispy cauliflower florets tossed in a tangy and spicy Manchurian sauce. A perfect start!

name: Chilli Paneer (Dry)
description: Soft paneer cubes stir-fried with bell peppers and onions in a fiery soy-chilli glaze.

name: Chicken Lollipop
description: Frenched chicken winglets marinated in spices and fried to perfection. Served with Schezwan sauce.

name: Schezwan Fried Rice
description: Aromatic basmati rice wok-tossed with fresh vegetables in a bold and spicy Schezwan sauce.

name: Veg Hakka Noodles
description: Classic noodles stir-fried with crunchy cabbage, carrots, and capsicum in a savory garlic-soy sauce.

name: Chilli Chicken (Gravy)
description: Tender chicken pieces in a spicy, umami-rich gravy with onions and capsicum. Pairs perfectly with fried rice.

name: Veg Manchurian (Gravy)
description: Vegetable dumplings simmered in a flavorful ginger, garlic, and soy-based gravy.

name: Fresh Lime Soda
description: A fizzy and refreshing drink to cool down the spice. Available sweet, salted, or mixed.
